level.heading: Purchase of memberships.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in the articles of incorporation or bylaws, a membership corporation that is not a charitable corporation shall not purchase any of its memberships or any right arising therefrom.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 29-404.40, § 29-404.41, and § 29-408.22.
